title: Kenji Kawai Concert - Cinema Symphony (DVDRip) ~by Yokky~
description:
Here is of Kenji Kawai's first concert - 'Cinema Symphony' (2007). 
________________________________________________________________________

DVDRip (2 audiotracks - stereo and 5.1)
________________________________________________________________________

Kenji Kawai is known for amazing music for Mamoru Oshii's anime ('Ghost in the Shell', 'Avalon', 'Patlabor') 
and for Hideo Nakata's horrors ('The Ring', 'Dark Water', 'Chaos', 'Death Note - L: Change the World') and for Death Note movies.

Here he and his orchestra perform such amazing pieces from such films and anime as:

________________________

~ Ghost in the Shell
~ Ghost in the Shell: Innocence 
~ Avalon
~ Death Note: Last Name 
~ Seven Swords 
~ Battle of Wits 
~ Running Wild 
~ Red Spectacles 
~ The Ring 
and 
~ Mezame No Hakobune a.k.a. 'Open Your Mind'.


________________________

Enjoy listening! ^_^
___________________________

Type: DVDRip.

Video: XVID 640x368 29.97fps [Stream 00]

Audio 1: MPEG Audio Layer 3 48000Hz stereo 320Kbps [Stream 01]
Audio 2: DTS 48000Hz 5ch 1509Kbps [Stream 02]
